text: can you give a link to the page with the form

I just removed some fields to try to make the form shorter (not ideal at all), it worked on desktop, but mobile (which is were a majority of our traffic comes from) is still showing the overflow/scroll bar inside the code/embed block…
on my iPhone (15) it looks pretty good I would say.  I think if someone wants to meet it seems very useable to me.
yeah I would say most figure it out - though we’ve gotten a handful of people who reach out saying they’ll click submit and get frustrated after multiple attempts
